name: SkyLunaSupport
_source: speak;Luna;I just wanted to remind you who's keeping you alive down here. If it weren't for me, you'd be Revenant food by now.
speak;Sky;Yes, I'm aware of your contributions. And I appreciate them very much.
speak;Luna;I'll see if that's true once I have gold in my palm. You nobles are all the same, after all.
speak;Luna;You're all the same. You act like you care, and then pinch pennies when it's time to help us commoners. I know the type.
speak;Luna;Of course you wouldn't. You never do.
speak;Luna;I'll keep healing you since you're the one paying us, but don't think for a second that means I like you.
